languages.text: {n}Лорд-инквизитор не выглядит слишком уж сожалеющим.{/n} "Насколько я понимаю, это была личная конфронтация двух Вольных Торговцев? В таком случае надеюсь, что ваша династия достигнет примирения с наследником Ее Светлости. Моим планам вы не помешали — леди Инцендия очистила Футфол в достаточной мере, чтобы я не отвлекался на его умиротворение".

{n}The Lord Inquisitor does not appear aggrieved at the news.{/n} "As I understand, this was a private confrontation between two Rogue Traders, yes? As such, I hope your house will reach a reconciliation with Her Ladyship's heir. You have not hindered my plans — Lady Incendia purged Footfall sufficiently that I was not distracted by the need to pacify it."
languages.original_text: {n}Лорд-инквизитор не выглядит слишком уж сожалеющим.{/n} "Насколько я понимаю, это была личная конфронтация двух Вольных Торговцев? As such, I hope your house will reach a reconciliation with Her Ladyship's heir. You have not hindered my plans — Lady Incendia purged Footfall sufficiently that I was not distracted by the need to pacify it."

{n}The Lord Inquisitor does not appear aggrieved at the news.{/n} "As I understand, this was a private confrontation between two Rogue Traders, yes? As such, I hope your house will reach a reconciliation with Her Ladyship's heir. You have not hindered my plans — Lady Incendia purged Footfall sufficiently that I was not distracted by the need to pacify it."

languages.text: {n}听到这个消息，大审判官并没有感到悲伤。{/n}“据我所知，这是两位行商浪人之间的私人冲突，没错吧？既然如此，我希望你的家族能与她的继承人达成和解。你并没有妨碍到我的计划，因森蒂娅女士已经对落脚港进行了充分的清洗，让我不必为落脚港的事务分心。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor does not appear aggrieved at the news.{/n} "As I understand, this was a private confrontation between two Rogue Traders, yes? As such, I hope your house will reach a reconciliation with Her Ladyship's heir. You have not hindered my plans — Lady Incendia purged Footfall sufficiently that I was not distracted by the need to pacify it."

traits.locale_text: {n}听到这个消息，审判长并没有感到悲伤。{/n}“据我所知，这是两位行商浪人之间的私人冲突，没错吧？既然如此，我希望你的家族能与她的继承人达成和解。你并没有妨碍到我的计划，因森蒂娅女士已经对落脚港进行了充分的清洗，让我不必为落脚港的事务分心。”

languages.text: {n}El Lord Inquisidor no parece especialmente dolido por la noticia.{/n} «Por lo que tengo entendido, esto ha sido una confrontación privada entre dos Comerciantes Independientes, ¿verdad? En ese caso, solo puedo esperar que su casa alcance una pronta reconciliación con quienquiera que herede el protectorado de milady. Sus acciones no han interferido en mis planes. La purga de lady Incendia en Paso ha sido lo suficientemente completa como para no tener que preocuparme por pacificarlo».
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor does not appear aggrieved at the news.{/n} "As I understand, this was a private confrontation between two Rogue Traders, yes? As such, I hope your house will reach a reconciliation with Her Ladyship's heir. You have not hindered my plans — Lady Incendia purged Footfall sufficiently that I was not distracted by the need to pacify it."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Lord Inquisidor no parece especialmente dolido por la noticia.{/n} «Por lo que tengo entendido, esto ha sido una confrontación privada entre dos Comerciantes Independientes, ¿verdad? En ese caso, solo puedo esperar que su casa alcance una pronta reconciliación con quienquiera que herede el protectorado de milady. Sus acciones no han interferido en mis planes. La purga de lady Incendia en Paso ha sido lo suficientemente completa como para no tener que preocuparme por pacificarlo».

languages.text: {n}ロード・インクィジターはこの知らせに困惑を見せない。{/n}「私の理解によれば、本件はふたりの自由開拓者間の私的な諍いだ、そうだろう？したがって、フォン・ヴァランシウス家がチョーダ閣下の相続人と和解に至ることが望ましい。私の計画を邪魔してはいない…レディ・インセンディアによるフットフォールの粛正は十分に成されており、私もお前たちの争いを仲裁する必要性に気を散らされることもなかった」
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor does not appear aggrieved at the news.{/n} "As I understand, this was a private confrontation between two Rogue Traders, yes? As such, I hope your house will reach a reconciliation with Her Ladyship's heir. You have not hindered my plans — Lady Incendia purged Footfall sufficiently that I was not distracted by the need to pacify it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ロード・インクィジターはこの知らせに困惑を見せない。{/n}「私の理解によれば、本件はふたりの自由開拓者間の私的な諍いだ、そうだろう？したがって、フォン・ヴァランシウス家がチョーダ閣下の相続人と和解に至ることが望ましい。私の計画を邪魔してはいない…レディ・インセンディアによるフットフォールの粛正は十分に成されており、私もお前たちの争いを仲裁する必要性に気を散らされることもなかった」

languages.text: {n}La nouvelle ne semble pas affecter le seigneur inquisiteur outre mesure.{/n} « De ce que je comprends, il s'agissait d'un affrontement privé entre deux {mf|libres-marchands|libres-marchandes}, c'est bien ça ? Dans ce cas, j'espère que votre maison parviendra à se réconcilier avec l'héritier de Sa Seigneurie. Mes plans restent inchangés ; dame Incendia a nettoyé Castel suffisamment bien pour que je n'aie pas à m'en préoccuper. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor does not appear aggrieved at the news.{/n} "As I understand, this was a private confrontation between two Rogue Traders, yes? As such, I hope your house will reach a reconciliation with Her Ladyship's heir. You have not hindered my plans — Lady Incendia purged Footfall sufficiently that I was not distracted by the need to pacify it."

traits.locale_text: {n}La nouvelle ne semble pas affecter le seigneur inquisiteur outre mesure.{/n} « De ce que je comprends, il s'agissait d'un affrontement privé entre deux {mf|libres-marchands|libres-marchandes}, c'est bien ça ? Dans ce cas, j'espère que votre maison parviendra à se réconcilier avec l'héritier de Sa Seigneurie. Mes plans restent inchangés ; dame Incendia a nettoyé Castel suffisamment bien pour que je n'aie pas à m'en préoccuper. »

languages.text: {n}Die Nachricht scheint den Großinquisitor nicht zu erzürnen.{/n} "Meines Wissens nach handelte es sich um eine private Auseinandersetzung zwischen Freihändlern, richtig? Ich hoffe daher, Euer Haus wird sich mit dem Erben Ihrer Ladyschaft versöhnen. Ihr habt meine Pläne nicht behindert – Lady Incendia hat Footfall ausreichend befriedet, und ich wurde nicht durch die Notwendigkeit abgelenkt, selbst einzugreifen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor does not appear aggrieved at the news.{/n} "As I understand, this was a private confrontation between two Rogue Traders, yes? As such, I hope your house will reach a reconciliation with Her Ladyship's heir. You have not hindered my plans — Lady Incendia purged Footfall sufficiently that I was not distracted by the need to pacify it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Nachricht scheint den Großinquisitor nicht zu erzürnen.{/n} "Meines Wissens nach handelte es sich um eine private Auseinandersetzung zwischen Freihändlern, richtig? Ich hoffe daher, Euer Haus wird sich mit dem Erben Ihrer Ladyschaft versöhnen. Ihr habt meine Pläne nicht behindert – Lady Incendia hat Footfall ausreichend befriedet, und ich wurde nicht durch die Notwendigkeit abgelenkt, selbst einzugreifen."

languages.text: {n}Haberi alan Lord Engizisyoncu, etkilenmiş gibi görünmüyor.{/n} "Anladığım kadarıyla iki Hür Tacir'in arasında geçen bir durum bu, öyle mi? Hâl böyleyse hanenin, Leydi Hazretleri'ni vârisiyle ortak bir yol bulabileceğini umarım. Planlarıma mâni olmuş değilsin. Leydi İncendia; Binliman'ı başarıyla temizledi, işi benim elime bırakmadı."
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor does not appear aggrieved at the news.{/n} "As I understand, this was a private confrontation between two Rogue Traders, yes? As such, I hope your house will reach a reconciliation with Her Ladyship's heir. You have not hindered my plans — Lady Incendia purged Footfall sufficiently that I was not distracted by the need to pacify it."
